entries.target: Codes d'état des vérifications de condition

entries.source: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.
entries.target: L'état de vérification pour soutenir ou refuser l'état clinique de la condition ou du diagnostic.

entries.context: There is not sufficient evidence to assert the presence of the subject's condition.
One of a set of potential (and typically mutually exclusive) diagnoses asserted to further guide the diagnostic process and preliminary treatment.
The subject is experiencing a return of a condition or situation after a period of improvement or remission, e.g. relapse of cancer, alcoholism.
There is sufficient evidence to assert the presence of the subject's condition.
This account is active and may be used.
This account is inactive and should not be used to track financial information.
